body:
Comment 2: 
This is a semi-deep problem in the linker, which is not
engineered for single .6 files being imported.

A workaround is to put the package into its own .a file,
like the standard package makefiles do:

6g -o _go_.6 DayOfWeek.go
gopack grc DayOfWeek.a _go_.6
rm _go_.6

Another workaround, as you found, is to define
other data or functions in the file.
_Status changed to **LongTerm**._
